name: A Summer of Ash and Prickly Pears

achievements.name: Omen Call of Ome Calli
achievements.desc: Light up the Easybreeze Holiday Resort map in the Natlan region.

achievements.name: Gentle Waves Guide
achievements.desc: Unlock all Teleport Waypoints in the following area in Natlan: Easybreeze Holiday Resort.

achievements.name: Sanctuary Pilgrim: Isle of Gentle Winds and Waves
achievements.desc: Unlock all the Shrines of Depths in the following area in Natlan: Easybreeze Holiday Resort.

achievements.name: Monetoo Will Guide You Home (III)
achievements.desc: Follow 6 Monetoo and complete the graffiti in the Easybreeze Holiday Resort.

achievements.name: Azure Isle Treasure Hunter
achievements.desc: Open 30 chests in Easybreeze Holiday Resort.

achievements.name: Azure Isle Treasure Hunter
achievements.desc: Open 60 chests in Easybreeze Holiday Resort.

achievements.name: Azure Isle Treasure Hunter
achievements.desc: Open 120 chests in Easybreeze Holiday Resort.

achievements.name: Azure Isle Adventurer
achievements.desc: Complete 6 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges in Easybreeze Holiday Resort.

achievements.name: Azure Isle Adventurer
achievements.desc: Complete 12 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges in Easybreeze Holiday Resort.

achievements.name: Azure Isle Adventurer
achievements.desc: Complete 24 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges in Easybreeze Holiday Resort.

achievements.name: A Colorful Album
